admission_text:
# WHY MEMBERSHIP MATTERS

Where can you find an [art museum](https://cedarhurst.org/art-exhibits/), [sculpture park](https://cedarhurst.org/goldman-kuenz-sculpture-park/), [interactive family center](https://cedarhurst.org/beck-family-center/), [hands-on art center](https://cedarhurst.org/cedarhurst-campus/), [world-class concerts](https://cedarhurst.org/music-series/), and [art education](https://cedarhurst.org/school-resources/), all surrounded by nature trails and peppered with wildlife? The answer is Cedarhurst Center for the Arts.

Cedarhurst is the perfect place to relax and renew your creative energy. Members receive free admission to five indoor galleries and the outdoor sculpture park; discounts on class registration, merchandise, and event tickets; and access to exclusive member events.

At the Patron level and higher, and as a Corporate member, your membership allows Cedarhurst to have an even greater impact on the region. [Membership](https://cedarhurst.org/support/membership-individual-support/) support helps Cedarhurst educate thousands of southern Illinois students learn about art, whether as part of a Museum tour or in the classroom, and provides free opportunities for adults and families alike.

[ JOIN OR RENEW TODAY! ](https://cedarhurst.membership.veevartapp.com/membership/view/join)

Cedarhurst is a [nationally accredited organization](https://cedarhurst.org/aam-accreditation/) that educates, entertains, and inspires. The interactive family center and mont...
